MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  LL14 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Trinity Street, Brittania Close, Wrexham Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:12PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  11:00PM on 2nd January 2021.
